# quest package

This is a package under construction for the processing of questionnaire data in Psychology. It has basic functions that 

- take simple questionnaire scoring keys as input
- recodes data accordingly
- computes factor scores (sums, means, factor scores from CFA)
- returns measurement models
- returns reliabilities for factors


An example of how to use it can be found in the example [`quest_example.Rmd`](https://github.com/kthorstmann/quest/blob/master/vignettes/quest_example.Rmd)


** This package is under developement and should not be used for now **
